category: Regulations for overseas Korean sports organizations/Article 4 (Procedures for designation of overseas Korean sports organizations)
contents: Article 4 (Procedures for designation of overseas Korean sports organizations) ① Pursuant to Article 13 4 of the Articles of Incorporation, sports organizations that wish to be designated as overseas Korean sports organizations by the Sports Council must apply for designation to the Sports Council. ② The Sports Association confirms the designation requirements in Article 3 and designates it as an overseas Korean sports organization through resolution by the Board of Directors.
